com.foreach.imageserver.core.services

Interface ImageFileDescriptorFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultImageFileDescriptorFactory

    public interface ImageFileDescriptorFactory
    Since:
    5.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileDescriptor createForOriginal(Image image)
      Create a file descriptor for the original file of an image.
      FileDescriptor createForVariant(Image image, ImageContext context, ImageResolution imageResolution, ImageVariant imageVariant)
      Create a file descriptor for a variant of an image.
      default String generateFileName(@NonNull Image image, ImageContext context, ImageResolution imageResolution, ImageVariant imageVariant)
      Default implementation for generating only the file name aspect of a descriptor, based on the variant of an image being requested.
      void removeVariantsForImageAndContext(FileManager fileManager, Image image, ImageContext imageContext)
      Remove all variants registered in a given context, for a given image.

        void removeVariantsForImageAndContext(FileManager fileManager,
                                      Image image,
                                      ImageContext imageContext)
        Remove all variants registered in a given context, for a given image.
        Parameters:
        fileManager - where the variants are stored
        image - to remove
        imageContext - context for which to remove the variants

      • generateFileName

        default String generateFileName(@NonNull
                                @NonNull Image image,
                                ImageContext context,
                                ImageResolution imageResolution,
                                ImageVariant imageVariant)
        Default implementation for generating only the file name aspect of a descriptor, based on the variant of an image being requested.
        Parameters:
        image - for which the file name should be generated
        context - that is being requested
        imageResolution - resolution being requested
        imageVariant - variant being requested
        Returns:
        file name
